languages.text: Существо получает на 50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физического урона{/g}. Любой {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} нейтрализует этот эффект на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −80%. Any {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or damage dealt to it by psychic powers nullifies this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: この生物に与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}は−50%減少される。この生物が受けた{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、この効果を無効化する。
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物に与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}は−50%減少される。この生物が受けた{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、この効果を無効化する。

languages.text: 对此生物造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}都会降低50%。当此生物承受任何来源的{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，或被{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此效果会失效，两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}后重新触发。
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对此生物造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}都会降低50%。当此生物承受任何来源的{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，或被{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此效果会失效，两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}后重新触发。

languages.text: Todo el {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}daño físico{/g} infligido a esta criatura se reduce un −50 %. Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido por {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} anula este efecto durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todo el {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}daño físico{/g} infligido a esta criatura se reduce un −50 %. Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido por {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} anula este efecto durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: Der gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physische Schaden{/g}, der dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, wird um −80 % verringert. Energieschaden wird um −40 % reduziert. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} hebt diesen Effekt 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang auf.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physische Schaden{/g}, der dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, wird um -80 % verringert. {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} wird um -40 % reduziert. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} hebt diesen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang auf.

languages.text: Cette créature bénéficie de réductions de −50 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}dégâts physiques{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} ou les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} annulent cet effet pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature bénéficie de réductions de -80 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}dégâts physiques{/g} et de -40 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} qu'elle subit. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} ou les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} annulent cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratığa verilen tüm {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}fiziksel hasar{/g}, %50 azalır. Herhangi bir kaynaktan gelen {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g} tarafından verilen her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, bu etkiyi 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} geçersiz kılar.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is reduced by −50%. {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental damage{/g} from any source or any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to it by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} nullifies this effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
